name: fact_one
english: bees can fly up to 5 miles a day in search of food
swahili: nyuki anaweza pepea maili tano kwa siku ikitafuta chakula

name: intro_frame_one
english: it is the year 2021| and the earth is no longer what it used to be
swahili: ni mwaka wa 2021| na dunia haiko vile ilivyokuwa kitambo

name: intro_frame_two
english: years of excess industrialisation have turned it into a desolate landscape
swahili: miaka mengi ya ujenzi iliyozidi imefanya ardhi iwe kavu

name: intro_frame_three
english: but this doesn't stop Beedee and her tireless team of workers
swahili: lakini hii haitasimamisha Beedee na wafanyikazi wenzake

name: intro_frame_four
english: are you ready to help Beedee save her colony and restore her home?
swahili: je| uko tayari kumsaidia Beedee kuokoa mzinga yake na kurejesha nyumbani yake?
